TopicTitle: Operation Golden Dawn: An old player learning new tricks

Articles.Content: I've been playing KSP since 2014, yet the first time I did a no-assist docking was only last week as of writing this. This has inspired me to try some things I've never really done before. At the same time, I've been wanting to do a real mission report for a long time now. I think I'll start by making a survey plane since aircraft are my weak spot. Expect some pics within the next few days.
